title: The Writer's Almanac for Saturday, April 2, 2022
description: “If you ask me what I came into this life to do, I will tell you: I came to live out loud.” -- Émile Zola, born on this day in 1840.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: “If you ask me what I came into this life to do, I will tell you: I came to live out loud.” -- Émile Zola, born on this day in 1840.
